# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. Given its high-quality features and benefits, we believe it's truly worth more than its face value. Considering its actual worth and the value it would bring to you, I'm offering it to you for $110. This is a special opportunity to acquire something of great value at a reasonable price. I trust you'll find this offer compelling. Let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $110. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $110
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
